member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsArgumentInvalidException_Argument_Name
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument:.

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsArgumentInvalidException_Generic
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The argument given is invalid or unknown in the current context..

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsHelper_DisplayHelp_Header
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to StakeMaster commandline arguments:.

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsHelper_DisplayHelp_InvalidArgument_Text
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0}{1}Please check your settings..

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsHelper_DisplayHelp_Text
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to General settings{0}-? or --help: Displays this help{0}{0}Settings regarding the stake function{0}-s=<true/false> or --stakes=<true/false> : Enables or disables modifications of inputs at the stake address. Default: true{0}-a=<address> or --stakeaddress=<addres> : Sets the dedicated stake address. Mandatory.{0}-c=<address> or --collectaddress=<address>: Sets the dedicated collect address. Mandatory.{0}-w=<days> or --patience=<days> : Sets the number of days when a input should stake at least on [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsHelper_ExtractArgument_ArgumentNotDefined_Message
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument is not defined..

member.name: P:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.Properties.Resources.SettingsHelper_ExtractArgument_ArgumentNotUnique_Message
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument is not unique..

member.name: T:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.SettingsArgumentInvalidException
member.summary: Represents errors that occur when unexpected arguments are found.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The argument that causes the exception.

member.name: M:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.SettingsArgumentInvalidException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The argument that causes the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference ( Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The argument that causes the exception.
The custom message that describes the error.

member.name: M:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.SettingsArgumentInvalidException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The argument that raised this exception.
The custom message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference ( Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.summary: Holds the argument that causes the exception.

member.name: T:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.SettingsHelper
member.summary: Contains methods for initializing and check settings.

member.summary: Displays the help message for the command line options.
member.param: An Additional message to show before the help message.

member.name: M:StakeMaster.BusinessLogic.SettingsHelper.Read(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns the settings based on the arguments given.
member.param: Arguments that are considered when generating the settings.
member.returns: Returns a -object with all properties set based on the given arguments.
